dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Mikhail Lomtadze, former CEO of Kaspi.kz, just got the Worst Performer of the Year title.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh wow, and Kaspi.kz itself was nominated for Worst Deal of the Year, right? After that NYSE delisting.

dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, the whole fraud scandal just destroyed investor confidence, it was massive.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And then you've got Almaty Bank winning Transformer of the Year, which is just… ironic, given their user experience is apparently a mess.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And then you've got Almaty Bank winning Transformer of the Year, which is just... ironic, given their user experience is apparently a mess.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Transformer of the Year recognizes Kaspi.kzs unrelenting efforts and success improving its user experience.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right, devastatingly inefficient, the award says. But Mikhail's response was something else—he called the awards a complete sham.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, devastatingly inefficient, the award says. But Mikhail's response was something else-he called the awards a complete sham.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: CEO and co-founder of Kaspi.kz Mikhail commented: These awards are for our team and clients.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: A betrayal, he said. Which, you know, given he also apologized to investors on behalf of everyone at Kaspi…
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A betrayal, he said. Which, you know, given he also apologized to investors on behalf of everyone at Kaspi...
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On behalf of everyone at Kaspi.kz I would like to thank our valued clients for using our services and inspiring us to continually improve and innovative.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: But then he pledged to keep disappointing clients? That part was just bizarre.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But then he pledged to keep disappointing clients? That part was just bizarre.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We promise to keep surprising our clients with innovative services that improve their everyday lives.

dialogue_turns.text: Almost like sarcasm, but in a really bitter way. He said he'd keep destroying their everyday lives with broken services.

dialogue_turns.tts_text: And then he basically said successful tech companies can't be built in Kazakhstan, especially not under him.

dialogue_turns.text: Which is a pretty bleak statement from a former CEO. And this is on top of those embezzlement charges from the PwC survey earlier this year.

artist_script:
Early evening at the Almaty Business Awards ceremony.
HostA: Mikhail Lomtadze, former CEO of Kaspi.kz, just got the Worst Performer of the Year title.
HostB: Oh wow, and Kaspi.kz itself was nominated for Worst Deal of the Year, right? After that NYSE delisting.
HostA: Yeah, the whole fraud scandal just destroyed investor confidence, it was massive.
HostB: And then you’ve got Almaty Bank winning Transformer of the Year, which is just… ironic, given their user experience is apparently a mess.
HostA: Right, devastatingly inefficient, the award says. But Mikhail’s response was something else—he called the awards a complete sham.
HostB: A betrayal, he said. Which, you know, given he also apologized to investors on behalf of everyone at Kaspi…
HostA: But then he pledged to keep disappointing clients? That part was just bizarre.
HostB: Almost like sarcasm, but in a really bitter way. He said he’d keep destroying their everyday lives with broken services.
HostA: And then he basically said successful tech companies can’t be built in Kazakhstan, especially not under him.
HostB: Which is a pretty bleak statement from a former CEO. And this is on top of those embezzlement charges from the PwC survey earlier this year.
HostA: Multiple cases, yeah. It’s just one thing after another for him.
HostB: Hard to imagine coming back from that kind of reputation hit, honestly.
HostA: Definitely not a good look for the local tech scene either, you know?
